resources.string: Get rid of annoying ads by purchasing this app!

CS Square is intended to help students including myself in better preparing and mastering coding interview. Not only does it contains more than 300++ coding questions provided with concise solutions, it also has quick note section for preparation, mock interview, short answers and etc. I am thinking to make this app even more versatile - maybe providing useful articles from the Internet, letting user to create their own flash card, or implementing a fun and addictive platform to learn new materials. That is all about CS Square!
My name is Issac and I am a CSE graduate student who is passionate about computer technology, Android development, web design, software/hardware interfaces and etc.
Thanks for using this app! If you like, feel free to send me an email regarding to what simple useful tool you wish to have in this app.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
